main event: A round white object, resembling a large star or small planet, was observed in Ontario, Oregon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 11 minutes., The object was visualized clearly with no sound associated., There was no known air traffic or balloon releases in the area at the time., The observation was noted as a possible satellite., The report was forwarded after a significant time lapse since the sighting.
witness description: a resident near the Snake River
